review.title: “Z Corp is a privately held company with a lot of great people.”
review.pros: Pros – The only 3D color rapid prototyping printer on the market.ProductPeopleManagementPay
review.cons: Cons – VP of SalesNo new materialsNot a bright outlook
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Sell the company why you can.

review.title: “As a private company...”
review.pros: Pros – There were some very talented people where one could learn a lot from.
review.cons: Cons – Unrealistic product management objectives and senior management could not make key decisions early in a product development cycle for "go" and especially "no-go". Could not retain talented employees that made a difference in a robust product. Human resource as a department was inadequate.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “If you were there early enough you really had a chance to help shape the company.”
review.pros: Pros – If you have good stuff to say they listen, though they may not act simply because its too hard. Its the coolest product around, unless you're into robots.
review.cons: Cons – The operations team does not like change. Its had several opportunities to take feedback and do great things over the last 2 years but has not.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Great experience”
review.pros: Pros – Great products, good environment, teamwork
review.cons: Cons – Tough market, limited investment, conservative
